title: Kids At Play
clues: Tommy was always upset to be called in for dinner before the other 2 boys
Mrs. Jones never had dinner ready later than 6:00pm
Of Dickey and the Jackson boy, one loved playing Red Light, Green Light and the other boy's dinner was at 6:00pm sharp
The Jackson boy didn't like Hide and Seek as much as Tommy
Harry always had 15 alone once the others were called in
Mr. Smith would have 15 minutes to read the newspaper after work before dinner was on the table at 5:30pm
